reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be of high quality, with a perfect fit and great length that works well for tall women. They appreciate its soft material, elegant style, and rich black color, while also noting it's not too heavy and comfortable to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ Cozy, Stylish & Perfect for Fall!
items.body: I ordered this long black, long-sleeve cardigan and itâ€™s exactly what I was hoping for! The length is perfect, it drapes beautifully, and itâ€™s just the right weight to keep me warm on crisp fall days without feeling heavy or bulky. The quality is fantastic â€” soft, well-made, and the stitching feels durable. Itâ€™s one of those pieces you can dress up for work or throw on casually for errands. Iâ€™ve already gotten compliments on it and love how versatile it is. Iâ€™m so impressed that Iâ€™m coming back to order a few more colors. If youâ€™re looking for a cozy, stylish cardigan for the season, this is the one! Read more
items.author: Arelly Isabel Salinas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to a suit
items.body: This sweater is good quality, stylish and warm. I have two of them and I wear them with slacks instead of a suit jacket. They are heavier than nylon dusters. The fit is true to size and they are soft and comfortable. I have a black one and a burgundy one and both colors are as dipicted. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but shows wear quickly
items.body: Fit was good, looks classy. Did start to pill pretty quickly. I only got to wear it 2 times before I snagged it and had to replace it. Read more
items.author: Tera Butz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit and length
items.body: I purchased a size small. In addition, I am 5â€3â€, 145 lbs. and my bust size is 40DD. The color is as pictured. The fit is great on me. The length is good. It stops just below my calves. I like that the cardigan can be dressed down or take it up a notch, and the price is great! Read more
items.author: Cynthia Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Please Customer
items.body: Very nice cardigan. It look just like the picture . You can wear it casual or dressed up, Its a true black. I'll order more colors Read more
items.author: EJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long and comfortable
items.body: Love these long sweaters. I am 5'9, and they come down to my knees. I bought three of them in different colors. They are soft and very comfortable and wear well. Then I purchased one in yellow. drapes beautifully, and the weight is just right â€” not too heavy, not too thin. The only thing to note is that the color is a little lighter in person than it appeared in the photos. It still looks great, just not as deep of a yellow as I expected. Read more
items.author: V

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs VERY large
items.body: Sweater is soft and well made, but it is huge, all over: bust, waist/hip area. I'm 5'1", 119 lbs, 36b and this sweater swallowed me ðŸ™. It's a shame, it would be so cute it it didn't run so large. Read more
items.author: Gina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute!!!
items.body: Super soft and comfortable and it looks great. The material is a good thickness but not too heavy. Sizing is on point and it fits well. Read more
items.author: l houwers

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Dark Grey, Black, A_navy Blue, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, K_beige, Yellow, Caramel, Dark Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
